list_definition.definition: to make by crossing strands in a pattern

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A machine was invented that could weave cloth.

list_definition.definition: (past tense, past participle weaved) to move backwards and forwards or from side to side

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The cyclist weaved in and out of the traffic.
